description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人，中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中华人民共和国主席、全国政协主席。中共八大元老之一。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party and People's Republic of China politician, former national-level leader, senior general of the People's Liberation Army, who served as President of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the National People's Political Consultative Conference. One of the Eight Elders of the CCP.

en: President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首职位。
description.en: The head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: A former major leader of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席
en: Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的领导人职位。
description.en: The leadership position of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任全国政协主席。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任全国政协主席。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会副主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会副主席
en: Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1956年至1982年设立的领导人职位。
description.en: A leadership position in the Communist Party of China that existed from 1956 to 1982.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央主席、国务院总理。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央主席、总书记。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman and General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指1976年10月6日，时任中共中央第一副主席、国务院总理华国锋等人，在中南海怀仁堂，将中央政治局委员王洪文、张春桥、江青、姚文元（“四人帮”）实行隔离审查的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event on October 6, 1976, when then First Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and Premier Hua Guofeng and others arrested the 'Gang of Four' (Wang Hongwen, Zhang Chunqiao, Jiang Qing, Yao Wenyuan) at Huairentang, Zhongnanhai.

en: Eight Elders of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 指在1980年代至1990年代间，在中华人民共和国拥有实际决策权力的八位中国共产党元老。
description.en: Refers to the eight veteran members of the Communist Party of China who held actual decision-making power in the People's Republic of China during the 1980s and 1990s.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，是1978年至1989年中国的实际最高领导人。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who was the paramount leader of China from 1978 to 1989.

description.zh-cn: 1978年起中华人民共和国推行的以“对内改革、对外开放”为中心的综合性政策。
description.en: A comprehensive policy centered on 'internal reform and external opening' implemented by the People's Republic of China since 1978.

description.zh-cn: 指1989年6月4日，中国人民解放军在北京天安门广场对示威集会进行的武力清场事件。
description.en: Refers to the event on June 4, 1989, when the People's Liberation Army used force to clear demonstrators from Tiananmen Square in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任国务院总理、中共中央总书记。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as Premier of the State Council and General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，是1989年至2002年中国的实际最高领导人。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who was the paramount leader of China from 1989 to 2002.

description.zh-cn: 1927年11月13日，中国共产党在湖北省黄安、麻城两县领导的农民武装起义。
description.en: An armed peasant uprising led by the Communist Party of China in Huang'an and Macheng counties, Hubei province, on November 13, 1927.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，是1949年至1976年中国的实际最高领导人。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who was the paramount leader of China from 1949 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，后与中共中央产生分裂。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China who later split with the CPC Central Committee.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1936年10月由中国工农红军红四方面军主力2.18万人，在甘肃靖远西渡黄河后，称河西部队，后改称西路军。
description.en: Formed in October 1936 by the main force of the Fourth Front Army of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army after crossing the Yellow River, it was tasked with establishing a base in Hexi and opening a route to the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，中共八大元老之一。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, one of the Eight Elders of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任铁道部部长。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, who served as Minister of Railways.

en: 5th Division of the New Fourth Army

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期由中国共产党领导的活动于鄂豫皖湘赣地区的武装力量。
description.en: An armed force led by the Communist Party of China active in the Hubei-Henan-Anhui-Hunan-Jiangxi region during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，中共八大元老之一。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, one of the Eight Elders of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战时期中国共产党在中国中原地区设立的军区。
description.en: A military region established by the Communist Party of China in the Central Plains region of China during the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，中国人民解放军大将。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, one of the ten Grand Marshals.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战初期，中原军区部队在国民党军的包围下，向外线突围的军事行动。
description.en: A military operation in the early stage of the Chinese Civil War where the troops of the Central Plains Military Region broke out from the encirclement of the Nationalist army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的创始人和主要领导人之一，中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: One of the founders and main leaders of the People's Liberation Army, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前领导人，曾任国务院副总理。
description.en: A former leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战“三大战役”之一，由中国人民解放军华东野战军、中原野战军在以徐州为中心，东起海州，西至商丘，北起临城，南达淮河的广大地区，对中华民国国军进行的战略性进攻战役。
description.en: One of the three major campaigns of the Chinese Civil War, a strategic offensive launched by the PLA's East China Field Army and Central Plains Field Army against the Republic of China Army.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间，由毛泽东发动和领导的，在中国大陆发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in mainland China from 1966 to 1976, initiated and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，中共元老与中央文革小组之间发生的一场政治斗争。
description.en: A political struggle between veteran CCP leaders and the Central Cultural Revolution Group during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第四任妻子，“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: The fourth wife of Mao Zedong and a member of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 1975年由邓小平主持的，对文化大革命造成的混乱局面进行全面整顿的政治行动。
description.en: A political action led by Deng Xiaoping in 1975 to comprehensively rectify the chaotic situation caused by the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 美国第40任总统。
description.en: The 40th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 清朝时期的湖北省行政区划。
description.en: The administrative division of Hubei province during the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任国防大学政治委员。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, who served as Political Commissar of the National Defense University.

description.zh-cn: 李先念接替刘少奇（至1968年）担任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Li Xiannian succeeded Liu Shaoqi (until 1968) as the President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李先念的国家主席职务由杨尚昆接替。
description.en: Li Xiannian was succeeded by Yang Shangkun as the President of the People's Republic of China.

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
position.en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 李先念担任国家主席期间，乌兰夫为副主席。
description.en: During Li Xiannian's presidency, Ulanhu served as Vice President.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 李先念接替邓颖超担任全国政协主席。
description.en: Li Xiannian succeeded Deng Yingchao as Chairman of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 李先念的全国政协主席职务由李瑞环接替。
description.en: Li Xiannian was succeeded by Li Ruihuan as Chairman of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会副主席

description.zh-cn: 在华国锋担任中共中央主席期间，李先念是副主席之一。
description.en: While Hua Guofeng was Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Li Xiannian was one of the Vice Chairmen.

description.zh-cn: 在胡耀邦担任中共中央主席期间，李先念是副主席之一。
description.en: While Hu Yaobang was Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Li Xiannian was one of the Vice Chairmen.

description.zh-cn: 李先念长期在国务院协助周恩来主持经济工作，在“文革”中是周恩来在经济工作方面的主要助手。
description.en: Li Xiannian assisted Zhou Enlai in overseeing economic work at the State Council for a long time and was Zhou's main assistant for economic affairs during the 'Cultural Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 李先念是粉碎“四人帮”的怀仁堂事变的主要决策人之一。
description.en: Li Xiannian was one of the main decision-makers in the Huairentang Incident that led to the downfall of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 李先念被认为是邓小平主政时期的“中共八大元老”之一。
description.en: Li Xiannian is considered one of the 'Eight Elders of the CCP' during Deng Xiaoping's era.

description.zh-cn: 李先念因其保守的计划经济思想而反对大幅度的改革开放。
description.en: Due to his conservative planned-economy ideology, Li Xiannian opposed large-scale reform and opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 在“六四天安门事件”中，李先念公开表态支持中央决定，支持武力镇压。
description.en: During the 'Tiananmen Square Incident', Li Xiannian publicly expressed support for the central government's decision and supported the use of force.

description.zh-cn: 李先念反对赵紫阳主导的经济改革，将其视为主要政治反对目标。
description.en: Li Xiannian opposed the economic reforms led by Zhao Ziyang and considered him a primary political opponent.

description.zh-cn: 李先念被认为是江泽民在六四事件后崛起的坚强后盾。
description.en: Li Xiannian is considered to have been a strong supporter of Jiang Zemin's rise after the Tiananmen Square incident.

description.zh-cn: 李先念于1927年11月参加了黄麻起义。
description.en: Li Xiannian participated in the Huangma Uprising in November 1927.

description.zh-cn: 在长征会师后，李先念向毛泽东汇报工作。在担任中央书记处书记期间，毛泽东是中央委员会主席。
description.en: After the Long March rendezvous, Li Xiannian reported to Mao Zedong. While serving as Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Mao Zedong was the Chairman of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 张国焘拒绝执行中共中央的北上方针，率领红四方面军（包括李先念部）南下。
description.en: Zhang Guotao refused to follow the CPC Central Committee's northward policy, leading the Fourth Front Army (including Li Xiannian's troops) southward.

description.zh-cn: 陈云和滕代远奉命接应兵败的西路军余部，其中包括李先念。
description.en: Chen Yun and Teng Daiyuan were ordered to rescue the remnants of the defeated Western Route Army, including Li Xiannian.

description.zh-cn: 滕代远和陈云奉命接应兵败的西路军余部，其中包括李先念。
description.en: Teng Daiyuan and Chen Yun were ordered to rescue the remnants of the defeated Western Route Army, including Li Xiannian.

description.zh-cn: 1945年1月，李先念率领的新四军第5师与王震的八路军南下支队会师。同年10月，共同组建中原军区。
description.en: In January 1945, the New Fourth Army's 5th Division led by Li Xiannian met with Wang Zhen's southward detachment of the Eighth Route Army. In October of the same year, they jointly established the Central Plains Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 由于国军压迫，中原军区部队于1946年6月26日发起中原突围。
description.en: Under pressure from the Nationalist army, the Central Plains Military Region troops launched the Central Plains Breakout on June 26, 1946.

description.zh-cn: 李先念曾与刘伯承、邓小平部在第二次国共内战期间共同作战并会师，协助刘邓开辟大别山根据地。
description.en: Li Xiannian fought alongside and rendezvoused with the forces of Liu Bocheng and Deng Xiaoping during the Chinese Civil War, assisting them in establishing the Dabie Mountains base area.

description.zh-cn: 李先念与邓小平在革命战争时期及建国后长期共事，在文革后期协助邓小平进行全面整顿。
description.en: Li Xiannian and Deng Xiaoping worked together for a long time during the revolutionary wars and after the founding of the PRC. In the later stages of the Cultural Revolution, he assisted Deng Xiaoping in the comprehensive rectification.

description.zh-cn: 1948年，李先念与邓子恢在开封参与领导淮海战役的后勤保障工作。
description.en: In 1948, Li Xiannian and Deng Zihui co-led the logistical support for the Huaihai Campaign in Kaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 李先念参与领导了淮海战役的后勤保障工作。
description.en: Li Xiannian participated in leading the logistical support for the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 1956年，李先念支持陈云、周恩来反对冒进的意见。
description.en: In 1956, Li Xiannian supported the opinions of Chen Yun and Zhou Enlai in opposing the 'rash advance'.

description.zh-cn: 1968年，李先念在文化大革命期间被下放到北京市北郊木材厂劳动。
description.en: In 1968, during the Cultural Revolution, Li Xiannian was sent to perform manual labor at a timber factory in the northern suburbs of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 李先念因被指为“二月逆流”成员而受到批判。
description.en: Li Xiannian was criticized for being identified as a member of the 'February Countercurrent'.

description.zh-cn: 在“二月逆流”后，江青称李先念为“附和错误路线”，使其受到批判。
description.en: After the 'February Countercurrent', Jiang Qing labeled Li Xiannian as 'adhering to an erroneous line', leading to his criticism.

description.zh-cn: 李先念协助邓小平进行1975年的全面整顿工作。
description.en: Li Xiannian assisted Deng Xiaoping in carrying out the comprehensive rectification of 1975.

description.zh-cn: 1984年里根访华期间，李先念与其讨论台湾问题。1985年7月，李先念访问美国。
description.en: During Reagan's visit to China in 1984, Li Xiannian discussed the Taiwan issue with him. In July 1985, Li Xiannian visited the United States.
